titleInfo.title: Circular letter no.813 of 1820, from James Bruce Simson, Secretary to Government, to Captain William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: In the letter Simson writes to inform Bruce that the Honourable Governor in Council thought Bruce's conduct 'laudable' for his bringing the complaint against the Commanding Officer of the Eliza, on account of his cruelty to his crew. However Simson adds that, as there are no grounds for trial, the matter will not be taken further.
